Class Mage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Heros.Hero
      • Heros.Mage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Hero>

    public class Mage
extends Hero
    Mage hero class. Sets base level 1 Mage fields. Checks to insure the class only has MageAbilities.
    Author:
    Kevin
